Title: Wanted: Lost Tuskarr Kite
Description:
<The posted sign is written in beautiful calligraphy.>

The archivists humbly request that all expedition members seek out the Lost Tuskarr Kite for our artifact archives.

If acquired, please deliver to Cataloger Jakes for processing and compensation.

Some expedition members have reported seeing such a kite attached to a tuskarr transport along the western coast, but none have been able to reach it as the transport keeps it aloft and out of reach when traveling.
PortraitGiverText: The kite sails proudly behind Lost Arvillo while he is moving...
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Cataloger Jakes in the Dragonscale Basecamp.
